about_the_game:
Welcome to Nūr, a thrilling hand-crafted 2D action-adventure game that will take you on an emotional journey of empowerment.

Join Nūr, a brave girl fighting cancer, on her mission to save her friends and bring her parents back home. Explore a vivid world filled with wonder and imagination, where every challenge brings Nūr closer to reuniting her family.

Nūr features meticulously crafted visuals and captivating storytelling, offering a heartfelt experience for players of all ages. With its touching narrative and hand-crafted charm, Nūr is a game that will touch your heart and inspire your imagination.

Get ready to join Nūr on their action-packed journey! Let's dive into this exciting adventure together!

Game Features:

  • Emotional Storyline: Nūr's journey is driven by a heartfelt narrative, guiding players through a tale of bravery, friendship, and family.
  • Hand-Crafted Visuals: The game's world is meticulously hand-crafted, bringing to life a vibrant and imaginative 2D environment.
  • Action-Packed Adventure: Players will experience thrilling action sequences, engaging in exciting challenges and battles.
  • Character Development: Nūr's character evolves throughout the game, reflecting themes of growth, resilience, and determination.
  • Uplifting Themes: The game explores themes of empowerment, friendship, and courage, resonating with players of all ages.
  • Imaginative World: Dive into a richly imaginative world where reality blends with the fantastical, creating a captivating setting.
  • Accessible Gameplay: Designed to be accessible to players of all skill levels, Nūr offers an inclusive gaming experience for everyone to enjoy.

Join Nūr, a brave girl fighting cancer, on her mission to save her friends and bring her parents back home. Explore a vivid world filled with wonder and imagination, where every challenge brings Nūr closer to reuniting her family.

Nūr features meticulously crafted visuals and captivating storytelling, offering a heartfelt experience for players of all ages. With its touching narrative and hand-crafted charm, Nūr is a game that will touch your heart and inspire your imagination.

Get ready to join Nūr on their action-packed journey! Let's dive into this exciting adventure together!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable, Nvidia and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Nūr

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible Video Card (Intel HD Graphics Not Supported)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join Nur on her quest to uncover the mystery of her missing parents and reunite with her friends. Experience a game that not only entertains but also touches the heart.
